attributes.action: increase funding into the mychoice homebuy scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a British resident in full-time employment attempting to get my foot onto the property ladder I was left dejected, lifeless and despondent this week as the plug was pulled on the mychoice homebuy "Government led" initiative.

It appears to me that this scheme "Government Equity Loan" has been very successful and funding has run out due to the popularity of its success.

What I ask is that this Labour Government increase funding asap to stimulate the housing market and increase public economic confidence.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Homebuy/

As stated in our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms as a Government website we cannot host party political material such as references to the political parties.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
